[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ fullwidth=”on” _builder_version=”4.0.11″ background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_fullwidth_header title=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF90aXRsZSIsInNldHRpbmdzIjp7ImJlZm9yZSI6IiIsImFmdGVyIjoiIn19@” _builder_version=”4.6.0″ _dynamic_attributes=”title” title_text_align=”center” subhead_text_align=”center” background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” background_layout=”light” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”10px||10px||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” title_font_size_tablet=”28px” title_font_size_phone=”22px” title_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_fullwidth_header][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.6.0″ custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false” z_index_tablet=”500″ box_shadow_horizontal_tablet=”0px” box_shadow_vertical_tablet=”0px” box_shadow_blur_tablet=”40px” box_shadow_spread_tablet=”0px” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.0.11″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.0.11″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.10.5″ hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

ICDM 2021 is pleased to announce offering several free registrations to encourage people with diverse backgrounds for conference participation. We encourage people from traditionally underrepresented groups to attend the virtual event with free registrations.

We encourage people from such groups to apply for this DEI award by sending us a paragraph of information on why would you like to attend the conference and how this support would enable you in advancing your knowledge. Please email Prof Richi Nayak <r.nayak@qut.edu.au>.  The closing deadline is 19 Nov 2021 NZDT.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
